perturbation.original_text:
Before a user can gain access to
the website, they must first verify their birthday (users must be 21 and over to even view the website).
perturbation.changed_text:
Before a user can gain access to
the website, they may be asked to verify their birthday.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the mandatory age verification for accessing the website creates a legal contradiction. Washington State law requires strict age verification for cannabis-related websites to prevent underage access.

perturbation.original_text:
Users will pay by linking their bank accounts via Evergreen Gateway
Account information will be stored and used for future orders
Once payment is confirmed users may proceed to completing their order
perturbation.changed_text:
Users will pay via methods determined by Pelican Delivers.
Account information storage and future order processing will be at Pelican Deliver's discretion.
Once payment users may proceed to completing their order
perturbation.explanation: By removing the requirement for bank account linking via Evergreen Gateway and making account information storage discretionary, the contract avoids specifying secure payment processing and data storage methods. This contradicts Washington State regulations regarding secure financial transactions and consumer data protection in the cannabis industry, particularly concerning financial transparency and data security.

perturbation.original_text:
After payment is confirmed users must upload their government issued ID and a selfie
Trulioo will verify if the issued ID is valid and if the selfie matches the ID
Once verification is completed the user will be able to complete the order
perturbation.changed_text:
Users may be required to upload identification.
Verification of identification is at the discretion of Pelican Delivers.
Once any required verification is completed the user will be able to complete the order
perturbation.explanation: By making ID verification discretionary, the contract violates Washington State law that mandates strict ID verification for cannabis purchases to ensure compliance with age restrictions and prevent illegal diversion. Removing the specific requirement for Trulioo verification further weakens the verification process.
